weka.distributed.spark

Class ArffHeaderSparkJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.spark.SparkJob
        • weka.distributed.spark.ArffHeaderSparkJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.EnvironmentHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.gui.beans.InstancesProducer, weka.gui.beans.TextProducer

    public class ArffHeaderSparkJob
extends SparkJob
implements weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.gui.beans.InstancesProducer, weka.gui.beans.TextProducer
    A Spark job for creating a unified ARFF header (including summary "meta" attributes).
    Version:
    $Revision: 13221 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
